thread.title: Conman Paul Ryan, back in the spotlight
thread.title_full: Conman Paul Ryan, back in the spotlight

author: goober
title: Conman Paul Ryan, back in the spotlight
text: Conman Paul Ryan, back in the spotlight Paul Ryan, the "serious" Republican is back in the spotlight. You remember Romney's VP candidate, and his "detailed plans" to the balance the budget, large tax cuts for the wealthy, financed by spending cuts (to be named later) and revenue increases by closing loopholes (to be named later). He is right in line with the GOP on policy, huge tax cuts for the wealthy, and something else, and something else and everything will turn out fine I'm sure. He has a serious detailed plan to replace ObamaCare, which involves the power of the market, and the something else yet to be determined. And I'm sure he has a plan for the Iran Deal, that involves tax cuts for the wealthy and something else to be determined later....that is guaranteed to work. Here's the thing about Paul Ryan, he's a conman, and he doesn't do well in the spotlight, his aura was losing it's shine during his VP run, and as speaker of the House, it wouldn't take long for him to be exposed for what he really is. Which is why it will be interesting to see if he abandons his presidential plans to be Speaker, which might just be the highest office he can reach. But he more than anyone else knows , that once he's past the soundbite, he's got nothing, and as Speaker, that would be exposed...
